content.raw:
Notes on building dlfcn-win32, an LGPL-licensed implementation of the POSIX dlfcn API, using the native Windows calls:

    git clone https://github.com/dlfcn-win32/dlfcn-win32
    cd dlfcn-win32
    mkdir build
    cd build
    cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install\Release -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=0 ..
    nmake
    nmake install
    cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install\Debug -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=0 ..
    nmake
    nmake install

The zipped result is in the [deps folder](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/).

Notes on building dlfcn-win32, an LGPL-licensed implementation of the POSIX dlfcn API, using the native Windows calls:

git clone https://github.com/dlfcn-win32/dlfcn-win32
cd dlfcn-win32
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install\Release -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=0 ..
nmake
nmake install
cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install\Debug -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=0 ..
nmake
nmake install

The zipped result is in the deps folder.
